Predefined Variables

Note that most of these variables can be inserted in a script through the context menu of the editor window of CLUCalc. The context menu can be accessed by pressing the right mouse button in the editor window. More...

Detailed Description

Note that most of these variables can be inserted in a script through the context menu of the editor window of CLUCalc. The context menu can be accessed by pressing the right mouse button in the editor window.
